name: Your Love Is Trash
description:
This is VN dating sim prototype was inspired by Doki Doki Donuts. In this quick prototype, your love interests are different forms of trash instead of donuts! You can choose between:

Debbie Dumpter - the joyful happy-go-lucky dumspter!

Papier Sheet - the outcast sheet of paper

Glasses Glas - the student body president of Sani Tation High

To progress through the game, hit the space bar or use your mouse! Keep your eye out for choices!

The music does not belong to me. All of the photos and character sprites are from Adobe Stocks. The fonts don't belong to me either. I only made the textboxes and the story!
